lines.text: Cribs won't help us! Suppose I'm in an aircraft that goes into a spin? Christmas daisies, where's my crib? And before I can find the right page, there's St. Peter, tap-tapping on my fuselage demanding my soul of me! Think that one over!

[When the enemy first bombs their airfield, and he embodies the attitude of the whole nation]
This is where we learn to take it.
